en.text:
I'm a Software Engineer specializing in full-stack development, with over three years of experience building scalable web applications, secure APIs, and high-performance backend systems.

Beyond development, I'm passionate about teaching and mentoring. I've had the privilege of guiding 300+ students in full-stack technologies, including Flask, MERN, ASP.NET Core, and Spring Boot, helping them build real-world applications and strengthen their problem-solving skills.

Currently, I'm focused on enterprise-level applications, refining my expertise in mobile and web development, security best practices, and scalable architecture.

Outside of coding, you'll find me exploring new tech stacks, gaming, and brainstorming innovative software ideas.

I'm always open to collaboration‚Äîlet's build something amazing together! üöÄ

en.text: Antoine served as a teaching assistant while I was an instructor. He is knowledgeable, professional and easy to work with. Antoine's commitment to growth in both himself and those around him would make him an asset to any team.

en.text: I had the privilege of working with Antoine on our computer science capstone project at CTU, where he was an instrumental member of our team. Antoine demonstrated exceptional leadership by driving the development efforts and mentoring me in programming stacks that were new to me. His technical expertise, coupled with his ability to uplift and support those around him, is truly remarkable. Antoine's work ethic is second to none. He consistently approaches challenges with determination and a solutions-oriented mindset. Beyond his technical skills, he is highly dependable, ensuring that every commitment he makes is fulfilled with excellence. His combination of technical proficiency, leadership, and reliability makes him an invaluable asset to any organization. It was an honor to collaborate with someone of his caliber, and I have no doubt that he will continue to achieve great success in his career. Any organization would be fortunate to have Antoine on their team.
